name: IntenseLogic
body:
# Intense Logic

Intense Logic is metagaming at its finest.

# Contact

You can contact the developers of Intense Logic by joining the IRC channel.
The details for the IRC channel are as follows.

    HOST:    irc.freenode.net
    CHANNEL: ##codelab
